basics.name: Daniel Kühne
basics.label: Platform and Cloud engineer
basics.summary: My biggest passion is to build infrastructure, pipelines and processes which help others to unleash their full potential. To accomplish this, I build environments in IaC on public clouds and on premise. Since 'you never walk alone', I surround myself with great people to achieve great things together.

highlights: refactoring of the release pipeline to use GitOps with ArgoCD and the app of apps pattern
creating of a developer cloud using a root server and Opennebula including IaC, dynamic Envoy ingress configuration and pull request workflow to include changes
improving the developer expierence by creating self service environments for the development of the IOT platform and establishing an internal developer platform
introducing an ADR process using MADR templates
evaluating a data aggregation service using Thanos as datastore

used technologies - Google Cloud (GCP, IAM, Compute Engine Networks), Azure (AKS, Networks), Opennebula, Talos Linux, Kubernetes, Docker, Helm, ArgoCD, GitOps, Envoy, Crossplane, TimescaleDB, CockroachDB, Kafka, EMQX, Redis, TiKV, Jaeger, Prometheus, Sentry, Jira, Notion, Slack, Figma, Miro
